body: To those in the comments who say this is gross or some shit: shut the fuck up
There is no "women"? Bitch that's basically an ugly female version of Bakugou lmao. Girl you must be stupid
The title is literally "cuntboy" so there is no "women" in this doujin and the author is female herself(-ko is a girls' name suffix in Japanese) so quit policing around ms woke obergruppenführer

has the author never had contact with a woman aside from his mother and really thinks women have an orgasm by just peeing or slightly touching their clitoterosis, the man who created this is the embodiment of what in my country we call "espanta viejas"
